welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content:
Brawlup.js is an API wrapper for [official Brawl Stars API](https://developer.brawlstars.com/) and also [ BrawlAPI](https://brawlapi.com/)! * Easy to use! * Supports %100 of the [Brawl Stars API](https://developer.brawlstars.com/)! * Has extra props/methods with [ BrawlAPI](https://brawlapi.com/)! ## Get Started * Install the package ```sh-session npm i brawlup.js ``` * Create an API key [here](https://developer.brawlstars.com/#/account) * Read our [docs](https://brawlup.js.org) üìù Examples avaible [here](https://github.com/brawlup/brawlup.js/tree/main/examples) ## Thanks to [ BrawlAPI](https://brawlapi.com/) (from [ Brawlify](https://brawlify.com/)) to allow us to use their API for this module. and also we used [ brawlstars.js](https://github.com/dannyhpy/brawlstars-nodejs) as well. ## Support You can get support for this module in our [ Discord server](https://discord.gg/PhW2XJa2yy)
Made by Up Devs‚Ñ¢

classes.name: AllMaps
classes.description: Gets all the maps from {@link https://brawlapi.com/}.

props.name: data
props.description: Returns all the map data in an array.

methods.name: findMap
methods.description: Finds the map you specified.

params.name: mapName
params.description: The map's name you want to get stats about.

classes.name: BrawlAPIError
classes.description: An error for responses from Brawl Stars API.

props.name: res
props.description: This error's response from Brawl Stars API.

props.name: headers
props.description: This error's headers. (Bearer access token, application/json)

classes.name: BaseClient
classes.description: The base class for the Brawl Stars client.

methods.name: increaseMaxListeners
methods.description: Increases max listeners by one, if they are not zero.

methods.name: decreaseMaxListeners
methods.description: Decreases max listeners by one, if they are not zero.

classes.name: BattleLog
classes.description: Detailed information about the player's battle log.

props.name: all
props.description: All of the battle log data of this player.

props.name: index
props.description: The battle index of this battle.

props.name: object
props.description: The battle object of this battle.

props.name: map
props.description: This match's map that was played in.

props.name: result
props.description: This match's result for this player. (victory, draw or defeat)

props.name: trophyChange
props.description: This match's trophy change for this player.

props.name: players
props.description: This match's players that was in this match. <warn>Only for `soloShowdown` and `bigGame`.</warn>

props.name: teams
props.description: This match's teams that was in this match. <warn>Only for 3v3 game modes.</warn>

props.name: starPlayer
props.description: This match's star player. <warn>Only for 3v3 game modes, `roboRumble` and `bossFight`</warn>

classes.name: BrawlerRecords
classes.description: Gets all the brawler records from {@link https://brawlapi.com/}.

props.name: records
props.description: Returns all the records in an array.

props.name: brawler
props.description: Returns the brawler that you are looking for.

methods.name: isRanked
methods.description: Is this player ranked in this records?

methods.name: findRanked
methods.description: Finds the ranked player.

classes.name: Brawlers
classes.description: Detailed information about the brawlers in-game.

props.name: all
props.description: Returns all the brawlers in an array.

props.name: gadgetCount
props.description: The total gadget count in game.

props.name: starPowerCount
props.description: The total star power count in Brawl Stars.

props.name: brawlerRarities
props.description: All the brawlers grouped by their rarities in game.

methods.name: findBrawler
methods.description: Finds the brawler from the game.

methods.name: sortByRarity
methods.description: Sorts the brawlers by rarity.

params.name: descending
params.description: If this sorting will be 'By Rarity Descending'. (default is 'By Rarity')

props.name: link
props.description: Sends this team's Brawlify check link.

methods.name: check
methods.description: Checks this team.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Login to Brawl Stars API.

methods.name: getPlayer
methods.description: Gets a player from the API.

params.name: tag
params.description: A player tag in Brawl Stars.

methods.name: getBattleLog
methods.description: Gets a player's battle log from the API.

params.name: tag
params.description: A player tag in Brawl Stars.

methods.name: getRankings
methods.description: Gets the rankings (aka leaderboard) from the API.

methods.name: getClub
methods.description: Gets a club from the API.

params.name: tag
params.description: A club tag in Brawl Stars.

methods.name: getBrawlers
methods.description: Gets all the brawlers from the API.

methods.description: Gets all the maps from BrawlAPI.

methods.name: getBrawlerRecords

params.name: brawlerID
params.description: A brawler id in Brawl Stars.

methods.name: increaseMaxListeners
methods.description: Increases max listeners by one, if they are not zero.

methods.name: decreaseMaxListeners
methods.description: Decreases max listeners by one, if they are not zero.

events.name: ready
events.description: Emitter whenever the Brawl Stars client is ready.

props.name: members
props.description: This club's members in an array.

methods.name: getMemberRank
methods.description: A player's club rank

methods.name: getMemberRole
methods.description: A player's club role

methods.name: playerCanJoin
methods.description: Checks if this player can join this club.

methods.name: sortMembers
methods.description: Sorts this club's members by trophies.

classes.name: ClubArray
classes.description: The array that's used for club role arrays.

props.name: count
props.description: Reflects the number of players in this role.

props.name: data
props.description: Returns all the event data in an array.

props.name: active
props.description: Returns all the active event data in an array.

props.name: upcoming
props.description: Returns all the upcoming event data in an array.

methods.name: getEvent
methods.description: Gets the event from this event data.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Is this map disabled? (which means it's not currently in-game)

props.name: version
props.description: This map's version. (how many times it has changed?)

props.name: dataUpdated
props.description: This map's data's last update timestamp.

methods.name: all
methods.description: Returns all of the data of this map.

classes.name: Player
classes.description: Detailed information about an in-game player.

props.name: expMax
props.description: This player's xp that will level them up.

props.name: expNeeded
props.description: This player's needed xp points to level up.

props.name: powerPlayPoints
props.description: This player's current power play points.

props.name: highestPowerPlayPoints
props.description: This player's highest power play points.

props.name: bestRoboRumbleLevel
props.description: This player's all time best robo rumble level.

props.name: brawlers
props.description: This player's unlocked brawlers in an array.

props.name: listBrawlers
props.description: This player's unlocked brawlers listed by their names.

props.name: club
props.description: This player's club data, if they joined one.

props.name: gadgetCount
props.description: This player's gadget count for all the brawlers they unlocked.

props.name: starPowerCount
props.description: This player's star power count for all the brawlers they unlocked.

methods.name: findBrawler
methods.description: Finds the brawler from this player data.

methods.name: getBattleLog
methods.description: Gets the battle log (last battles) of this player.

params.name: index
params.description: The index of the battle log data.

methods.name: getClub
methods.description: Gets the club of this player.

methods.name: sortBrawlers
methods.description: Player's brawlers will be sorted.

params.name: sortBy
params.description: Which one you want to sort by? (trophies, highest trophies, power level, rank)

methods.name: missingBrawlers
methods.description: This player's missing brawlers.

methods.description: Requests data from {@link https://brawlapi.com/}

params.name: tag
params.description: A player tag in Brawl Stars.

params.name: tag
params.description: A player tag in Brawl Stars.

methods.name: getClub
methods.description: Gets a club from the API.

params.name: tag
params.description: A club tag in Brawl Stars.

methods.name: getClubMembers

methods.name: getBrawler

methods.name: getBrawlers

methods.name: getBrawlersRankings

props.name: nameColor
props.description: This player's name color (not in hex format)

typedefs.name: PlayerSpecialEventLevel
typedefs.description: Player's best special event level in an object.

props.name: otherInsane
props.description: This best level's insane level (in roman numbers).

props.name: levelsLeft
props.description: This best level's levels left to reach the max. (insane 16) level.

typedefs.name: PlayerSeasonEnd
typedefs.description: Player's season end data in an object.

props.name: trophies
props.description: This player's total trophies that will be set when this season ends.

props.name: starPoints
props.description: This player's star point gain when this season ends.

props.name: brawler
props.description: Rankings brawler id. ONLY USE IF 'options.type' IS 'brawlers'.

props.name: link
props.description: This game mode's link at {@link https://brawlify.com}

props.name: image
props.description: This game mode's image from {@link https://brawlify.com}

props.name: brawler
props.description: This player's brawler that was playing with in this match.

typedefs.name: TagResolver
typedefs.description: A Brawl Stars tag is a unique string for defining a {@link Club club} or a {@link Player player}. This string can ONLY include * Letters: `P`, `Y`, `L`, `Q`, `G`, `R`, `J`, `C`, `U`, `V` * Numbers: `0`, `2`, `8`, `9` Note: While fetching/requesting data using HTML, the tag's `#` will be replaced with `%23`

typedefs.name: PlayerBrawlerSortingOptions
typedefs.description:
The sorting option for player brawler sorting.
* `trophies` or `1`
* `highest trophies` or `2`
* `power level` or `3`
* `rank` or `4`
* `rarity` or `5`
* `rarity descending` or `6`

typedefs.name: BrawlerRarities
typedefs.description: All the brawlers grouped by their rarities in game.

props.name: mythic

props.name: legendary

props.name: chromatic
props.description: All the chromatic brawlers in game.
